analysis: The project is a website about black holes with a dark, cosmic theme. The HTML file contains sections for interactive planets and animated slides. The CSS file needs to be completed with a full dark, cosmic theme including animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. The JavaScript file has syntax errors and incomplete functions that need to be fixed to ensure all animations and interactions work properly.

improvements.description: Complete the CSS file with a full dark, cosmic theme including animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements.
